review_text:
We visited Siji Minfu on January 1, 2017. We stopped in for a late lunch and the restaurant was packed. Our guide stated that was the sign of a good restaurant. We did not order the duck but we did have the traditional Beijing appetizers, a chicken dish, a beef dish, dumplings and a bottle of rice wine. The food...
Ещё

The food here is amazing! 5 stars for the Peking duck! As you walk into the restaurant you can see how they cook the duck and also when you order a chef comes to your table and cuts the duck perfectly for you to enjoy. First time I have experienced anything like it so it was brilliant to see. Sadly...
Ещё

It is near to Dongsi Shitiao Station, but customer needs to mind the time of last trains and buses. Customers in line were provided quick respond (QR) codes to check the availability of seat. The menu with clear texts and pictures was easy to read. It is advised to save the time of decision making by reading it during queue...
Ещё
A very tasty roast duck in a cosy restaurant. The service is wonderful. The value for money is excellent.

Had a great meal went with friend we ordered green sprouts with sauce , shrimp with honey and of course the duck plus a jug of blueberry juice was really yum too I loved how they bought out the duck and sliced it up in front of you very nicely done and very tasty making pancake rolls Would definitely go...
Ещё

I have been a fan of the more famous Dadong Roast Duck ever since I started going there 15 years...
